channel.title: Make ITEMS unspawnable [PI]
channel.description: Hey, i got an pvp server where u can type ::item, ::pure etc.. But, ppl can spawn everything, i want to make it so they can not spawn a ags etc. How Do i do this? Thanks anyways. Hope You reply :| I'm using PI

item.title: Make ITEMS unspawnable [PI]
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

[quote=“P A N I C, post:5, topic:391776”][code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”)) && playerRights == 3){
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“That item ID does not exist.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Wrong usage: (Ex:(::item_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

                            }
                    }
                    [/code][/quote]Lol read what he said he doesnt want to take the spawning away he wants to make some items donor and im not entirely sure on how to make it donor there might be some tutorials on it search in the tutorial section donator items.

Read full topic

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”)) && playerRights == 3){
try {

if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {

} else {

}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Wrong usage: (Ex:(::item_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))”);

item.title: Make ITEMS unspawnable [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Epicmaul Epicmaul
item.description:
@Epicmaul wrote:

There has already been a question answered like this.

[quote=“I Vain I”]I suggest searching people requesting help, as this has been answered numerous times.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) { try { int noSpawn[] = {item, item, item, item, item, item, item}; String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) { for (int u : noSpawn) { if (newItemID != u) { c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { c.sendMessage("You cannot spawn that item!"); } } } else { c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist."); } } else { c.sendMessage("Wrong usage: (Ex:(::pickup_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))"); } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); } } [/quote]

Read full topic
